lines.text: ...Eesh. I don’t think I’m gonna get too up close and personal with the dead body.
But… huh. That bullet hole is kinda weird. Is that how they normally look?
Ah- yes. Yes, that’s how they normally look.
...I don’t know. I’ve seen a lot of bullet holes in my day, and that one’s… unusually tidy.
I’m just gonna <c=#FF00FF>make a note of how that evidence has changed.</c>
